K01prmosubu:1: praṇamya pūrvaṃ jagati pradhānaṃ duḥkhālayottīrṇam anantapāram* /
K01prmosubu:14: nirvṛte mayi yuṣmākam eṣa śāstety abhiṣṭutaḥ // 7 //
K01prmosubu:23: buddhānāṃ sukham utpādaḥ sukhā dharmasya dhīṣaṇā
K01prmosubu:24: sukhā saṃghasya sāmagrī śramaṇānāṃ tapaḥ sukham* // 9 //
K01prmosubu:25: sukhaṃ darśanam āryāṇāṃ saṃvāso 'pi satā sukhaḥ /
K01prmosubu:26: adarśanena bālānāṃ nityam eva sukhaṃ bhavet* // 10 //
K01prmosubu:27: sukhaṃ dṛṣṭāḥ śīlavantaḥ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭā bahuśrutāḥ /
K01prmosubu:29: sukhā nadī sukhaṃ tīrthaṃ sukhaṃ dharmajito jataḥ /
K01prmosubu:31: sukho hi vāsaḥ kṛtaniścayānāṃ jitendriyāṇāṃ ca bahuśrutānām* /
K01prmosubu:32: śānteṣv araṇyeṣu jarāṃ gatānāṃ vaneṣu nirvāpitayauvanānām* // 13 //
K01prmosubu:33: nirgatam āyuṣmanto grīṣmāṇāṃ yāvat tāvad avaśiṣṭam* /
K01prmosubu:37: apramādādhigatāhi tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhir iti vā apy evaṃbhāgīyāḥ kuśalā dharmā bodhipakṣyāḥ /
K01prmosubu:39: anāgatānām āyuṣmantaś chandapariśuddhiṃ cārocayata ārocitāṃ ca pravedayata /
K01prmosubu:40: praṇamya śākyasiṃhāya bhūtvā hy asmai kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
K01prmosubu:41: prātimokṣaṃ pravakṣyāmi vinayaṃ tac chṛṇotu naḥ // 14 //
K01prmosubu:42: śrutvā ca tat karotv atra yathā proktaṃ maharṣiṇā /
K01prmosubu:44: yatnād drutaṃ satataṃ yaś ca cittahayaṃ mukhavacaneṣu anusārayati /
K01prmosubu:45: prātimokṣakhalīnam api sadṛśaṃ śatakaṇṭakaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ yenātividhyate // 16 //
K01prmosubu:46: mahātmanaḥ ye vacanamātreṇa yathābhāgān na nivartante /
K01prmosubu:48: yeṣāṃ tu khalīnam idaṃ na vidyate nāpi antaḥkāmaṃ /
K01prmosubu:50: śṛṇotu bhadantaḥ saṃghaḥ adya saṃghasya poṣadhaḥ cāturdaśikaḥ pāṃcadaśiko vā (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee 7)
K01prmosubu:51: sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṃghasya poṣadhaṃ kuryāt prātimokṣasūtroddeśam uddeśayed eṣā jñaptiḥ /
K01prmosubu:52: poṣadhaṃ vayam āyuṣman kariṣyāmaḥ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam uddeśāmaḥ /
K01prmosubu:55: tūṣṇīṃbhāvena ca vayam āyuṣmataḥ pariśuddhān vedayiṣyāmaḥ /
K01prmosubu:56: yathāpi pratyekaṃ pṛṣṭasya bhikṣor vyākaraṇaṃ bhavati evam evaṃ evaṃrūpāyāṃ bhikṣuparṣadi yāvat trir apy anuśrāvaṇaṃ bhavati /
K01prmosubu:57: yaḥ punar bhikṣur evaṃrūpāyāṃ bhikṣuparṣadi yāvat trir apy anuśrāvyamāne smaran satīm āpattiṃ nāviṣkaroti saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādo 'sya bhavati
K01prmosubu:58: saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādaḥ khalv āyuṣmantaḥ antarāyiko dharma ukto bhagavatā /
K01prmosubu:59: tasmāt smaratā bhikṣuṇā āpannena viśuddhāpekṣeṇa satī āpattir āviṣkartavyā /
K01prmosubu:60: āviṣkṛtenāsya phāsu bhavati nāviṣkṛtena na bhavati /
K01prmosubu:63: dvir api trir api pṛcchāmi -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
K01prmosubu:64: atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
K01prmosubu:66: ime khalu āyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
K01prmosubu:68: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣūṇāṃ śikṣāsājīvasamāpannaḥ śikṣām apratyākhyāya śikṣādaurbalyam anāviṣkṛtyābrahmacaryaṃ maithunaṃ dharmaṃ pratisevate antatas tiryagyonigatayāpi sārdhaṃ,
K01prmosubu:69: ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
K01prmosubu:71: yaḥ punar bhikṣur grāmagatam araṇyagataṃ vā pareṣāṃ adattaṃ steyasaṃkhyātam ādadīta
K01prmosubu:72: yadrūpeṇādattādānena rājā vainaṃ gṛhītvā rājamātro vā hanyād vā saṃbadhnīyād vā pravāsayed
K01prmosubu:73: vā evaṃ cainaṃ vadet* -- tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa cauro 'si bālo 'si steno 'sīty evaṃrūpaṃ
K01prmosubu:75: ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājayiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
K01prmosubu:77: yaḥ punar bhikṣur manuṣyaṃ vā manuṣyavigrahaṃ vā svahastena saṃcintya jīvitād vyaparopayet* /
K01prmosubu:78: śastraṃ vainām ādhārayec chastradhārakaṃ vāsya paryeṣeta maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpayen maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsyānusaṃvarṇayet* /
K01prmosubu:79: evaṃ cainaṃ vadet* -- haṃbho puruṣa kiṃ tava pāpakenāśucinā durjīvitena mṛtaṃ te
K01prmosubu:80: bho puruṣa jīvitād varam iti cintānumataiś cittasaṃkalpair anekaparyāyeṇa maraṇāya
K01prmosubu:81: vainaṃ samādāpayen maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsya anusaṃvarṇayet sa ca tena kālaṃ kuryād ayam
K01prmosubu:84: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anabhijānann aparijānann asantam asaṃvidyamānam anuttaramanuṣyadharmam
K01prmosubu:85: alamārya viśeṣādhigamaṃ jñānaṃ vā darśanaṃ sparśavihāratāṃ vā pratijānīyād idaṃ jānāmīdaṃ
K01prmosubu:86: paśyāmīti sa pareṇa samayena samanuyujyamāno vā asamanuyujyamāno vā āpanno viśuddhiṃ
K01prmosubu:87: prakṣyaivaṃ vaded ajānann evāham āyuṣmanto 'vocaṃ jānāmīty apaśyāmīti riktaṃ tucchaṃ
K01prmosubu:88: mṛṣāvyapalapanam anyatrābhimānāt* ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
K01prmosubu:89: uddiṣṭā mayāyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā yeṣāṃ bhikṣur anyatamānyatamam āpattim
K01prmosubu:90: adhyāpatya na labhate bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvāsaṃ bhogaṃ vā yathāpūrvaṃ ca tathāpaścāt
K01prmosubu:92: tatrāham āyuṣmantaḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
K01prmosubu:93: dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
K01prmosubu:94: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
K01prmosubu:96: ime khalv āyuṣmantas trayodaśa saṃghāvaśeṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
K01prmosubu:100: yaḥ punar bhikṣur avalavipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ kāyasaṃsargaṃ samāpadyeta
K01prmosubu:101: hastagrahaṇaṃ vā bāhugrahaṇaṃ vā veṇīgrahaṇaṃ vā anyatamānyatamasya vā aṅgapratyaṅgasaṃsparśanaṃ
K01prmosubu:104: yaḥ punar bhikṣur avadalavipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmaṃ duṣṭhulayā pāpikayā asabhyayā maithunopasaṃhitayā vācā ābhāṣeta yathāpi tāṃ yuvā yuvatiṃ saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
K01prmosubu:106: yaḥ punar bhikṣur avadalavipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmasya purastād ātmanaḥ kāyaparicaryāyā
K01prmosubu:107: saṃvarṇayed etad agraṃ mātṛsvasaḥ paricaryāṇāṃ yaduta mādṛśaṃ bhikṣuṃ śīlavantaṃ
K01prmosubu:108: kalyāṇadharmāṇaṃ brahmacāriṇam anena dharmeṇa paricared yaduta maithunopasaṃhitena saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
K01prmosubu:110: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃcaritraṃ samāpadyeta striyaṃ vā puruṣamatena puruṣaṃ vā strīmatena jāyātvena vā jāritvena vā antatas tatkṣaṇikāyām api saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
K01prmosubu:112: svayaṃ yācitā bhikṣuṇā kuṭiṃ kārayitvā asvāmikām ātmoddeśikāṃ prāmāṇikā kuṭiḥ kārayitavyā /
K01prmosubu:113: tatredaṃ kuṭyāḥ pramāṇaṃ dairghyeṇa dvādaśa vitastayaḥ sugatavitastyā tīryak saptāntarataḥ /
K01prmosubu:115: abhinītair bhikṣubhir vāstu draṣṭavyam anārambhaṃ saparikramam* /
K01prmosubu:116: sārambhe ced bhikṣur vāstuny aparākrame svayaṃ yācitāṃ kuṭiṃ kārayed asvāmikām ātmoddeśakāṃ
K01prmosubu:117: bhikṣūṃś ca nābhinayed vāstu darśanāya anabhinītair bhikṣubhiḥ adarśitavāstuni pramāṇaṃ
K01prmosubu:120: mahallakaṃ punar bhikṣuḥ vihāraṃ kārayamānāḥ sasvāmikaṃ saṃghoddeśakaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā bhikṣavo 'bhihitavyā vāstudarśanāya /
K01prmosubu:121: ataḥ abhinītair bhikṣubhir vāstu draṣṭavam anāraṃbhaṃ saparikramam* /
K01prmosubu:122: sāraṃbhe ced bhikṣur vāstuny aparikrame mahantaṃ vihāraṃ kārayitvā yat sasvāmikaṃ saṃghoddeśakaṃ bhikṣūṃś ca nābhinayed vāstudarśanāya saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ
K01prmosubu:124: yaḥ punar bhikṣur dviṣṭoddeśād apratītaḥ śuddhaṃ bhikṣuṃ amūlakena pārājikena dharmeṇānudhvaṃsayed
K01prmosubu:125: apy evainaṃ brahmacaryāc cyāvayeyam iti tasya ca apareṇa samayena samanuyujyamāno
K01prmosubu:126: vā asamanuyujyamāno vā amūlakam eva svādhikaraṇaṃ bhaved bhikṣuś ca dveṣe pratiṣṭhed
K01prmosubu:129: yaḥ punar bhikṣur dviṣṭoddeśād apratītaḥ śuddhaṃ bhikṣuṃ anyasya vā anyathābhāgīyasya
K01prmosubu:130: adhikaraṇasya kañcid eva leśamātraṃ dharmam upādāya pārājikena dharmeṇa anudhvaṃsayed
K01prmosubu:131: apy evainaṃ brahmacaryāc cyāvayeyam iti tasya ca apareṇa samayena samanuyujyamānasya
K01prmosubu:132: vā samanuyujyamānasya vā anyabhāgīyaṃ tad adhikaraṇaṃ bhavati kaścid eva leśoddeśamātro
K01prmosubu:133: dharma upātto bhavati bhikṣuś ca dveṣe pratiṣṭhed dveṣād avocam iti saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
K01prmosubu:135: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākramed bhedakaraṇasaṃvartanīyaṃ
K01prmosubu:136: cādhikaraṇaṃ samādhāya pragṛhya tiṣṭhet sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ
K01prmosubu:137: -- mā tvam āyuṣman samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākramed bhedakaraṇasaṃvartanīyaṃ
K01prmosubu:139: sametv āyuṣman sārdhaṃ saṃghena samagro saṃghasahitaḥ saṃmodamāno 'vivadamānaḥ ekāgradharmoddeśaḥ
K01prmosubu:140: ekakṣīrodakībhūtaḥ śāstu darśayamānaḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ vihāraṃ tu niśṛja tvam āyuṣman*
K01prmosubu:142: evaṃ cet sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir ucyamānas tathaiva vastu samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭhet*
K01prmosubu:143: śuddhas tu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ na ca pratiniḥsṛjed dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ
K01prmosubu:144: samanuśāsitavyaḥ tasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api samanuyujyamānaḥ
K01prmosubu:145: samanuśiṣyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjet saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
K01prmosubu:147: tasya khalu bhikṣor bhikṣavaḥ syur sahāyakāḥ vyagravādinaḥ eko vā dvau vā saṃbahulā
K01prmosubu:148: vā te tān bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeyuḥ -- mā yūyam āyuṣmantaḥ taṃ bhikṣuṃ kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ
K01prmosubu:149: vā kiṃcid vadata tat kasmād dhetor dharmavādī āyuṣmanto bhikṣur vinayavādī ca so
K01prmosubu:150: 'smākaṃ caiṣaś chandaṃ ca ruciñ cādāya tu vyāharati /
K01prmosubu:151: jānaṃś ca sa bhikṣur bhāṣate nājānan yac cāsya bhikṣoḥ rocate ca kṣamate ca asmākam api rocate ca kṣamate ca iti /
K01prmosubu:152: te bhikṣavo bhikṣubhir evaṃ syur vacanīyā -- māyuṣmanta evaṃ vadantu na ca sa bhikṣur
K01prmosubu:153: dharmavādī na vinayavādī adharmaṃ caiṣo 'vinayaṃ cāsmākaṃ chandaṃ ruciñ cādāya tu
K01prmosubu:154: vyāharati nājānaṃś ca sa bhikṣur bhāṣate jānaṃś ca yac cāsya bikṣoḥ rocate ca kṣamate
K01prmosubu:155: ca tavāyuṣmato 'pi saṃghabhedaḥ na rocate māyuṣmatām api saṃghabhedo rocate sametv
K01prmosubu:156: āyuṣmantaḥ saṃghena samagro hi saṃgho saṃmodamāno avivadamāno ekāgradharmoddeśaḥ
K01prmosubu:157: ekakṣīrodakībhūtaḥ śāstu darśayamānaḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharantu /
K01prmosubu:158: tiṣṭha mā tvam āyuṣman saṃghabhedāya niḥsṛja imām evaṃrūpāṃ saṃghabhedakarāṃ kathām* /
K01prmosubu:159: evaṃ te bhikṣavo bhikṣubhiḥ dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyāḥ samanuśāsitavyās tasya
K01prmosubu:160: vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyāḥ samanuśāsitavyāḥ pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ
K01prmosubu:161: ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
K01prmosubu:163: saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ anyatamaṃ grāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upaniḥśritya vihareyus te ca syuḥ kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ teṣāṃ ca kulāni duṣṭāni dṛśyeran vā śrūyeran vā prajñāyeran vā /
K01prmosubu:164: te bhikṣavaḥ bhikṣubhir evaṃ syur vacanīyāḥ -- āyuṣmantaḥ kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ
K01prmosubu:165: yuṣmākaṃ kulāni duṣṭāni dṛśyante 'pi śrūyante 'pi prajñāyante 'pi yuṣmākaṃ ca te
K01prmosubu:166: pāpasamācārā dṛśyante 'pi śrūyante 'pi prajñāyante 'pi prakramadhvaṃ āyuṣmantaḥ yūyaṃ
K01prmosubu:167: asmād āvāsād alaṃ yuṣmākaṃ iha vāseneti /
K01prmosubu:168: evaṃ cet te bhikṣavas tān bhikṣūn vadeyuḥ -- chandagāmina āyuṣmantaḥ bhikṣava dveṣagāmino
K01prmosubu:169: mohagāmino bhayagāminaś ca evaṃrūpāyāḥ āpattyāḥ ekatya bhikṣūn pravāsayanty ekatya
K01prmosubu:171: tatra bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ syur vacanīyāḥ -- mā āyuṣmanta evaṃ vadata /
K01prmosubu:172: ekatya bhikṣavaś chandagāmino dveṣagāmino mohagāmino bhayagāminaś ca evaṃrūpāyāḥ āpattyāḥ ekatya bhikṣūn pravāsayanty ekatya bhikṣūn na pravāsayantīti
K01prmosubu:174: neme bhikṣavaś chandagāmino dveṣagāmino mohagāmino bhayagāminaś ca āyuṣmanta khalu
K01prmosubu:175: kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ yuṣmākaṃ kulāni duṣṭāni dṛśyante 'pi śrūyante 'pi pāpakāś
K01prmosubu:176: ca yuṣmākaṃ samācārā dṛśyante 'pi śrūyante 'pi prajñāyante 'pi /
K01prmosubu:177: bhikṣava āyuṣmantaś chandagāmino dveṣagāmino mohagāmino bhayagāminaś ca -- niḥsṛjata imām evaṃrūpāṃ kathām* /
K01prmosubu:178: te bhikṣavaḥ bhikṣubhir evaṃ bhāsitavyāḥ -- evaṃ cet pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ
K01prmosubu:179: no cet pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyāḥ samanuśāsitavyās tasya pratiniḥsargāya
K01prmosubu:180: dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyāḥ samanuśāsitavyāḥ pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ
K01prmosubu:183: bhikṣur iha kaścid durvācyasvabhāvo bhavati uddeśyaparyāpannaiḥ śikṣāpadaiḥ sugatasūtraparyāpannaiḥ
K01prmosubu:184: bhikṣubhiḥ sahadharmeṇa sahavinayenocyamāna ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karoti -- mā mām āyuṣmantaḥ
K01prmosubu:185: yūyaṃ kiṃcid vadata kalyāṇam akalyāṇaṃ vā aham api āyuṣmataḥ na kiṃcid vakṣyāmi kalyāṇam
K01prmosubu:186: akalyāṇaṃ vā viramantu āyuṣmantaḥ mama vacanād aham api viraṃsyāmi yuṣmākaṃ vacanād iti /
K01prmosubu:187: sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir evaṃ syād vacanīyo -- āyuṣman uddeśyaparyāpannaiḥ śikṣāpadaiḥ
K01prmosubu:188: sugatasūtraparyāpannaiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ sahadharmeṇa sahavinayenocyamāna ātmānam tvaṃ
K01prmosubu:189: avacanīyaṃ karoṣi āyuṣman vacanīyam eva ātmānaṃ karotu āyuṣmantam bhikṣavo sahadharmeṇa
K01prmosubu:190: sahavinayena vadantu āyuṣmān api bhikṣūn sahadharmeṇa sahavinayena vadatu evaṃ saṃbaddhā
K01prmosubu:191: hi tasya bhagavataḥ tathāgatasya arhato samyaksaṃbuddhasya pariṣad yad idaṃ anyonyavacanīyād
K01prmosubu:192: anyonyāpattivyutthāpanād iti māyuṣman ātmānaṃ avacanīyaṃ karotu /
K01prmosubu:193: sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir evaṃ bhāsitavyaḥ -- evaṃ ced tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ
K01prmosubu:194: kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjed dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyas tasya
K01prmosubu:195: pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyaḥ pratiniḥsṛjed
K01prmosubu:196: tad vastu ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjet saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
K01prmosubu:198: nava prathamāpattayaś catvāro yāvattṛtīyakā yeṣāṃ bhikṣur anyatamānyatamaṃ dharmam āpanno yāvatkālaṃ jānan pratichādayati tāvatkālaṃ tena akāmataḥ paryuṣitavyam* /
K01prmosubu:199: akāmataḥ paryuṣitaparivāsena bhikṣuṇā uttariṣaḍrātraṃ saṃghamānatvaṃ cartavyaṃ bhavati /
K01prmosubu:200: cīrṇamānatto bhikṣur āvarhaṇapratibaddhaḥ kṛtānudharmaḥ bhikṣusaṃghasya ārādhitacitto yatra syād viṃśatigaṇo bhikṣusaṃghasya tatra ca so bhikṣur āvarhitavyaḥ /
K01prmosubu:201: ekenāpi ced ūno viṃśatigaṇo bhikṣusaṃghas taṃ bhikṣum āvarhet sa ca bhikṣur anāvrīḍas te ca bhikṣavo gārhyāḥ tatra samayaḥ /
K01prmosubu:202: yatrāhaṃ āyuṣmataḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
K01prmosubu:203: dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
K01prmosubu:204: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evaitad dhārayāmi /
K01prmosubu:206: imau khalu āyuṣmantau dvau aniyatau dharmau anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchataḥ /
K01prmosubu:208: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdham eka ekikayā rahasi praticchanne āsane niṣadyāṃ kalpayed alaṃ kāmayitum* /
K01prmosubu:209: sacec chrāddheyavacanopāsikā trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇām anyatamānyatamadharmeṇa vadet pārājikena
K01prmosubu:210: vā saṃghādiśeṣeṇa vā pāyantikena vā niṣadyāṃ bhikṣuḥ pratijānamānaḥ trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇām
K01prmosubu:211: anyatamānyatamena dharmeṇa kārayitavyaḥ pārājikena vā saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa vā pāyantikena
K01prmosubu:212: vā yena yena vā punaḥ śrāddheyavacanopāsikā taṃ bhikṣuṃ dharmeṇa vadet tena tena
K01prmosubu:215: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdham eka ekikayā rahasi praticchanne āsane niṣadyāṃ kalpayen nālaṃ kāmayitum* /
K01prmosubu:216: sacec chrāddheyavacanopāsikā dvayor dharmayoḥ anyatamānyatamadharmeṇa vadet saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa
K01prmosubu:217: vā pāyantikena vā niṣadyāṃ bhikṣuḥ pratijānato dvayor dharmayoḥ saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa vā
K01prmosubu:218: pāyantikena vā yena yena vā punaḥ śrāddheyavacanopāsikā taṃ bhikṣuṃ dharmeṇa vadet
K01prmosubu:219: tena tena dharmeṇa sa bhikṣuḥ kārayitavyo 'yam api dharmo 'niyataḥ /
K01prmosubu:220: uddiṣṭā me āyuṣmantaḥ dvāv aniyatau dharmau /
K01prmosubu:221: tatrāham āyuṣmataḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
K01prmosubu:222: dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
K01prmosubu:223: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
K01prmosubu:225: ime khalu āyuṣmantas triṃśan naisargikāḥ pāyantikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
K01prmosubu:227: niṣṭhitacīvareṇa bhikṣuṇā uddhṛte kaṭhine daśāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaram avikalpitaṃ dhārayitavyaṃ tataḥ uttari dhārayen naisargikā pāyantikā
K01prmosubu:229: niṣṭhitacīvaro bhikṣuḥ uddhṛtakaṭhine ekarātram api cet trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇām anyatamānyatamasya cīvarād bahiḥsīmāṃ vipravased anyatra saṃghasaṃmatyā
K01prmosubu:232: niṣṭhitacīvarasya bhikṣor uddhṛte kaṭhine utpatya akālacīvaram ākāṃkṣinā tena bhikṣuṇā tac cīvaraṃ pratigṛhītavyaṃ pratigṛhya sacet paripūryate kṣipram eva kṛtvā dhārayitavyam* /
K01prmosubu:233: no cet paripūryate māsaparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā tac cīvaram upanikṣiptavyaṃ satyāṃ cīvarapratyāśāyām ūnasya vā paripūrayet tataḥ uttari upanikṣipen naisargikapāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:235: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātikayā bhikṣuṇyā purāṇacīvaraṃ dhāvayed raṃjayed ākoṭayed vā naisargikapāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:237: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātikayā bhikṣuṇyā santikāc cīvaraṃ pratigṛhṇīyād anyatra parivartakān naisargikapātayantikā /
K01prmosubu:239: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātigṛhapatiṃ gṛhapatipatnīṃ vopasaṃkramya cīvaraṃ vijñāpayed anyatra samayān naisargikapāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:240: tatrāyaṃ samaya ācchinnacīvaro bhikṣur bhavati naṣṭacīvaro dagdhacīvaro ūḍhacīvaro hṛtacīvaro 'yaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
K01prmosubu:242: ācchinnacīvareṇa bhikṣuṇā naṣṭacīvareṇa dagdhacīvareṇa ūḍhacīvareṇa hṛtacīvareṇājñātigṛhapatinā
K01prmosubu:243: gṛhapatipatnīṃ cīvaraṃ vijñāpayitavyaḥ taṃ cec chrāddho brāhmaṇo gṛhapatir vātyarthaṃ
K01prmosubu:244: saṃbahulaiś cīvaraiḥ pravārayed ākāṃkṣatā tena bhikṣuṇā sāntarottaraparamaṃ tasmāc
K01prmosubu:245: cīvaraṃ pratigṛhītavyaṃ tata uttari pratigṛhṇīyān naisargikā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:247: bhikṣuṃ khalūddiśyājñātinā gṛhapatinā gṛhapatipatnyā vā cīvaracetanakāni pratyupasthāpitāni
K01prmosubu:248: syuḥ ebhir ahaṃ cīvaracetanakair evaṃrūpaṃ caivaṃrūpaṃ ca cīvaraṃ cetayitvā evaṃnāmā
K01prmosubu:249: bhikṣur upasaṃkramiṣyati tam ācchādayiṣyāmi cīvareṇa kāle kalpikeneti /
K01prmosubu:250: tatra caiko bhikṣuḥ pūrvam apravāritaḥ san kaṃcid eva vikalpaṃ pratipadya tam ajñātiṃ
K01prmosubu:251: gṛhapatiṃ gṛhapatipatnīṃ vopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vaded yāni tāni āyuṣmatā mām uddiśya cīvaracetanakāni
K01prmosubu:252: pratyupasthāpitāni sādhyāyuṣmaṃs te cīvaracetanakair evaṃrūpaṃ caivaṃrūpaṃ ca cīvaraṃ
K01prmosubu:258: ebhir āvāṃ pratyekapratyekaiḥ cīvaracetanakair evaṃrūpaṃ caivaṃrūpaṃ ca pratyekapratyekaṃ cīvaraṃ cetayitvā evaṃnāmā bhikṣur upasaṃkramiṣyati tam ācchādayiṣyāvaḥ /
K01prmosubu:260: tatra cet sa bhikṣuḥ pūrvam apravāritaḥ san kaṃcid eva vikalpam āpatya tam ajñātigṛhapatiṃ
K01prmosubu:261: gṛhapatipatnīṃ vopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vaded yāni tāny āyuṣmatyātmān uddiśya pratyekapratyekāni
K01prmosubu:263: sādhyāyuṣmatau tau pratyekapratyekaiś cīvaracetanakair evaṃrūpaṃ caivaṃrūpaṃ ca cīvaraṃ
K01prmosubu:264: cetayitvā ācchādayatām ubhāv api bhūtvā ekaikena cīvareṇa kāle kalpikena kalyāṇakāmatām
K01prmosubu:267: bhikṣuṃ khalūddiśya rājñā vā rājamātreṇa vā brāhmaṇena vā gṛhapatinā vā naigamena
K01prmosubu:268: vā jānapadena vā dhaninā vā śreṣṭhinā vā sārthavāhena vā dūtasya haste cīvaracetanakāni anupreṣitāni syuḥ /
K01prmosubu:269: atha sa dūtas tāni cetanakāni ādāya yena sa bhikṣus tenopasaṃkrāmed upasaṃkramya
K01prmosubu:270: taṃ bhikṣum evaṃ vaded yat khalv ārya jānīyāt tvām uddiśya rājñā vā rājamātreṇa vā
K01prmosubu:271: brāhmaṇena vā gṛhapatinā vā naigamena vā jānapadena vā dhaninā vā śreṣṭhinā vā sārthavāhena
K01prmosubu:272: vā cīvaracetanakena vānupreṣitāny āryaṃ pratigṛhṇātv anukampām upādāya /
K01prmosubu:273: tena bhikṣuṇā sa dūta idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ -- gacchāyuṣman dūta bhikṣūṇāṃ cīvaracetanakāni patyante parigṛhītuṃ /
K01prmosubu:274: cīvaraṃ tu vayaṃ labdhvā pratigṛhṇīmaḥ kāle kalpikaṃ /
K01prmosubu:275: sa dūtas taṃ bhikṣum evaṃ vaded asti kaścid āryāṇāṃ vaiyyāvṛtyakaro ya āryāṇāṃ vaiyyāvṛtyaṃ pratyanubhavatīti /
K01prmosubu:276: cīvarārthikena bhikṣuṇā vaiyyāvṛtyakaro vyapadeṣṭavya ārāmiko vā upāsako vā ete dūta bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyyāvṛtyakarā ete bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyyāvṛtyaṃ pratyanubhavantīti
K01prmosubu:277: atha sa dūtas tāni cīvaracetanakāny ādāya yena sa vaiyyāvṛtyakaras tenopasaṃkrāmet* /
K01prmosubu:279: khalv āyuṣman vaiyyāvṛtyakara jānīyā ebhis taṃ cīvaracetanakair evaṃrūpam caivaṃrūpaṃ
K01prmosubu:280: ca cīvaraṃ cetayitvā evaṃnāmā bhikṣur upasaṃkramiṣyati tam ācchādayethā cīvareṇa kāle kalpiteneti /
K01prmosubu:281: atha sa dūtas taṃ vaiyyāvṛtyakaraṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca samanuyujya samanuśiṣya yena sa bhikṣus tena saṃkrāmet* /
K01prmosubu:282: upasaṃkramya taṃ bhikṣum evaṃ vaded yo 'sāv āryeṇa vaiyyāvṛtyakaro vyapadiṣṭaḥ samanuśiṣṭaḥ samayena tam upasaṃkrāmethā ācchādayiṣyati sa satvāṃ cīvareṇa kāle kalpiteneti /
K01prmosubu:283: cīvarārthikena bhikṣuṇā vaiyyāvṛtyakara upasaṃkramya dvis triś codayitavyaḥ smārayitavyo
K01prmosubu:284: 'rthiko 'smy āyuṣman vaiyyāvṛtyakara cīvareṇārthiko 'smy āyuṣman vaiyyāvṛtyakara cīvareṇeti /
K01prmosubu:285: dvis triś codayataḥ smārayataḥ sacet tac cīvaram abhiniṣpadyate ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ
K01prmosubu:286: no ced abhiniṣpadyeta catuṣpaṃcaṣaṭkṛtvaḥ paraṃ tūṣṇīm uddeśe sthātavyaṃ catuṣpaṃcaṣaṭkṛtvā
K01prmosubu:287: paraṃ tūṣṇahīm uddeśe sthitasya sacet tac cīvaram abhiniṣpadyeta ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ
K01prmosubu:288: no ced abhiniṣpadyeta na uttari dhyāyacchec cīvarasyābhinivartaye abhiṣpanne cīvare
K01prmosubu:290: no ced abhiniṣpadyeta yasyā diśas tāni cīvaracetanakāny ānītāni tatra svayaṃ vā gantavyam
K01prmosubu:291: āpto vā dūto 'nupreṣitavyaḥ yāni tāny āyuṣmadbhir evaṃnāmānaṃ bhikṣum uddiśya cīvaracetanakāny
K01prmosubu:292: anupreṣitāni na tāni tasya bhikṣoḥ kaṃcid arthaṃ spharanti prajānātv āyuṣmantaḥ svam
K01prmosubu:293: arthaṃ mā vo 'rthaḥ praṇaśyatv ity ayaṃ tatra sāmayaḥ /
K01prmosubu:295: yaḥ punar bhikṣur navaṃ kauśeyasaṃstaraṃ kārayen naisargikapāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:297: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ śuddhakālakānām eḍakaromnāṃ navaṃ saṃstaraṃ kārayen naisargikapāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:299: navaṃ bhikṣuṇā saṃstaraṃ kārayatā dvau bhāgau śuddhakālakānām eḍakaromnām ādātavyau
K01prmosubu:300: tṛtīyo 'vadātānāṃ caturtho gocarikāṇām anādāya ced bhikṣur dvau bhāgau śuddhakālakānām
K01prmosubu:301: eḍakaromnāṃ tṛtīyo 'vadātānāṃ caturtho gocarikāṇāṃ navaṃ saṃstaraṃ kārayen naisargikapāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:303: navaṃ bhikṣuṇā saṃstaraṃ kārayatā akāmaṃ ṣaḍ varṣāṇi kṛtvā dhārayitavyam* /
K01prmosubu:304: arvāk ced bhikṣuḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ varṣāṇāṃ taṃ purāṇasaṃstaraṃ niḥsṛjya vā aniḥsṛjya vā anyaṃ navaṃ saṃstaraṃ kārayed anyatra saṃghasaṃmatyā [saṃghasaṃvṛtyā] naisargikapāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:306: navaṃ bhikṣuṇā niṣadanaṃ kārayitā purāṇaniṣadanasāmantakāt sugatavitastir ādātavyā navasya durvarṇīkaraṇāya /
K01prmosubu:307: anādāya ced bhikṣuḥ purāṇaniṣadanasāmantakāt sugatavitastiṃ navasya durvarṇīkaraṇāya navaṃ niṣadanaṃ paribhuṃjīta naisargikapāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:309: bhikṣoḥ khalv adhvapratipannasyotpadyerann eḍakaromāṇy ākāṃkṣatā tena bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhītavyāni
K01prmosubu:310: pratigṛhya yāvat triyojanaparamaṃ svayaṃ hartavyāny asati hārake tata uttari pāren
K01prmosubu:313: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātikayā bhikṣuṇyā eḍakaromāṇi dhāvayed raṃjayed vivaṭed vivaṭāpayed vā naisargikapāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:315: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ jātarūparajatam udgṛhṇīyād udgrāhanasatvā naisargikā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:317: yaḥ punar bhikṣur nānāprakāraṃ rūpikavyavahāraṃ samāpadyeta naisargikā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:319: yaḥ punar bhikṣur nānāprakāraṃ krayavikrayaṃ samāpadyeta naisargikā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:321: daśāhaparamaṃ bhikṣuṇā atirekapātraṃ dhārayitavyaṃ tata uttaraṃ paridhārayen naisargikā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:323: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ūnapaṃcabandhanena pātreṇa pāribhogikenānyaṃ navaṃ pātraṃ paryeṣeta /
K01prmosubu:325: tena bhikṣuṇā tat pātraṃ bhikṣuparṣady upaniḥsṛṣṭavyaḥ yaḥ tasyāṃ bhikṣuparṣadi pātraparyanto bhavati /
K01prmosubu:326: tat tasya bhikṣor anupradātavyam idaṃ te bhikṣoḥ pātraṃ vādhiṣṭhātavyaṃ na vikārayitavyaṃ sacen mandaṃ mandaṃ paribhoktavyaṃ yāvad bhedanaparyantam upādāya ity ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
K01prmosubu:328: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ svayaṃ yācitena sūtreṇājñātinā tantuvāyena cīvaraṃ vāyeyam iti niṣpanne cīvare naisargikā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:330: bhikṣuṃ khalūddiśyājñātiḥ gṛhapatir vā gṛhapatipatnī vājñātitantuvāyena cīvaraṃ vāyayet
K01prmosubu:331: tatra cet sa bhikṣuḥ pūrvam apravāritaḥ san kaṃcid eva vikalpam āpadya tam ajñātiṃ
K01prmosubu:333: yat khalv āyuṣmāṃs tantuvāya jānīyā idaṃ cīvaram asmān uddiśya ūyate sādhv āyuṣmaṃs
K01prmosubu:334: tantuvāya idaṃ cīvaraṃ suvistṛtaṃ ca kuru suvilikhitaṃ ca suvitakṣitaṃ ca svākoṭitaṃ
K01prmosubu:335: cāpy eva vayam āyuṣmate tantuvāyāya kāṃcid eva mātram upasaṃhariṣyāmo yaduta piṇḍapātaṃ
K01prmosubu:336: vā piṇḍapātamātraṃ vā piṇḍapātasaṃbalaṃ vā cīvarasyābhiniṣpattaye abhiniṣpanne cīvare
K01prmosubu:339: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣoś cīvaraṃ datvā tataḥ paścād abhiṣiktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto nātmamanā ācchindyād ācchedayed vā evaṃ cainaṃ vaded ānaya bhikṣo cīvaraṃ na te bhūyo dadāmīti /
K01prmosubu:340: tena bhikṣuṇā tac cīvaraṃ tac ca śeṣam upaniḥsṛṣṭavyaṃ bhuktasya ca naisargikā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:342: daśāham āgatāyāṃ kārtikyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ bhikṣor utpadyetātyayakacīvaram ākāṃkṣatā
K01prmosubu:343: tena bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhītavyaṃ pratigṛhya yāvac cīvaradānakālasamayād dhārayitavyaṃ
K01prmosubu:346: bhikṣavaḥ khalu saṃbahulāḥ āraṇyakeṣu śayanāsaneṣu na varṣakā bhavanti sāśaṅkasaṃmateṣu
K01prmosubu:347: nānābhayasaṃmateṣu sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmateṣu ākāṃkṣatā āraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā trayāṇāṃ
K01prmosubu:348: cīvarāṇām anyatamānyatamaṃ cīvaram antargṛhe upanikṣiptavyaṃ syāt khalv āraṇyakasya
K01prmosubu:349: bhikṣos tadrūpapratyayo bahiḥsīmāṃ gantuṃ ṣaḍrātraparamam āraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā tasmāc
K01prmosubu:350: cīvarād bahiḥsīmāṃ vipravastavyaṃ tata uttari vipravasen naisargikā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:352: māsyaḥ śeṣo grīṣmāṇāṃ bhikṣuṇā varṣāśāṭīcīvaraṃ paryeṣitavyam ardhamāsāvaśiṣṭā kṛtvā dhārayitavyam* /
K01prmosubu:353: arvāk ced bhikṣuḥ śeṣo grīṣmāṇāṃ varṣāśāṭīcīvaraṃ paryeṣeta ūrdhvam ardhamāsāvaśiṣṭā varṣāḥ kṛtvā dhārayen naisargikā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:355: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇatam ātmanaḥ paudgalikaṃ pariṇāmayen naisargikā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:357: yāni tāni bhagavatā glānānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ sāṃpreyāṇi pratisevanīyāni bhaiṣajyāny ākhyātāni
K01prmosubu:358: tadyathā sarpis tailaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ tāny ākāṃkṣatā glānena bhikṣuṇā saptāhaparamaṃ
K01prmosubu:359: svayam adhiṣṭhāya saṃnidhikāraparibhogena paribhoktavyāni tata uttari paribhuṃjīta
K01prmosubu:361: uddiṣṭā me āyuṣmantas triṃśan naisargikapāyantikā dharmāḥ /
K01prmosubu:362: tatrāham āyuṣmantaḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
K01prmosubu:363: dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
K01prmosubu:364: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
K01prmosubu:366: ime khalv āyuṣmantaḥ navatiḥ pāyantikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
K01prmosubu:374: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan samagreṇa saṃghena yathādharmam adhikaraṇam upanikṣiptaṃ punaḥ karmaṇaḥ khoṭayet pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:376: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmasyottari ṣaṭpaṃcikayā vācā dharmaṃ deśayed anyatra vijñapuruṣāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:378: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anupasaṃpannāya pudgalāya padaśo dharmaṃ vācayet pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:380: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anupasaṃpannāya pudgalāya duṣṭhulāpattim ārocayed anyatra saṃghasaṃmatyān [saṃghasaṃvṛtyā] pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:382: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anupasaṃpannāya pudgalāyottaraṃmanuṣyadharmam ārocayed bhūtāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:384: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ samanujño bhūtvā tataḥ paścād evaṃ vaded yathā saṃstutikayāyuṣmantaḥ sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇatam ātmanaḥ paudgalikaṃ pariṇāmayantīti pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:386: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśe uddiśyamāne evaṃ vadet kiṃ punar
K01prmosubu:387: ebhir āyuṣmantaḥ kṣudrānukṣudraiḥ śikṣāpadair anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśair
K01prmosubu:388: uccāryamānair yāni bhikṣūṇāṃ kaukṛtyāya saṃvartante ālekhāya vilekhāya vileṭhāya
K01prmosubu:397: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sāṃghikaṃ maṃcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā vṛṣiko vā biṃbopadhānacaturaśrakaṃ
K01prmosubu:398: vā abhyavakāśe upanikṣipyoparikṣipya vā anuddhṛtānuddhṛtya vā tato viprakrāmet santaṃ
K01prmosubu:401: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sāṃghike vihāre tṛṇasaṃstaraṃ vā parṇasaṃstaraṃ vā saṃstīrya vā
K01prmosubu:402: saṃstārya vā anuddhṛtyānuddhārya vā tato viprakrāmet santaṃ bhikṣum anavalokyānyatra
K01prmosubu:405: yaḥ punar bhikṣur abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto 'nāttamanā sāṃghikād vihārād bhikṣuṃ niṣkarṣen niṣkārṣāpayed vā anyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā
K01prmosubu:407: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sāṃghike vihāre pūrvopagatānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tataḥ paścād āgatyānupraskandyāsane
K01prmosubu:408: niṣadyāṃ śayyāṃ vā kalpayed yasya saṃbādho bhaviṣyati sa viprakramiṣyatīti ity eva
K01prmosubu:411: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sāṃghike vihāre uparivihāyasikṛtāyāṃ kuṭikāyām āhāryapādake maṃce vā pīṭhe vā sahasā balenābhipaded vābhinipadyeta vā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:413: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan saprāṇakenodakena tṛṇaṃ vā gomayaṃ vā mṛttikāṃ vā siñcet siñcayed vā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:415: mahāntaṃ bhikṣuṇā vihāraṃ kārayitvā yāvad dvārakośārgalasthānād ālokasaṃjñinā bhūmiparikarmopādāya
K01prmosubu:416: dvau vā trayo vā chedanaparyāyāḥ saharitāḥ adhiṣṭhātavyāḥ tata uttari adhitiṣṭhet pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:418: yaḥ punar bhikṣur asaṃmataḥ saṃghena bhikṣuṇīr avavadet tadrūpadharmasamanvāgamāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:420: saṃmataś cāpi bhikṣur saṃghena yāvat sūryāstagamanakālasamayāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:422: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣum evaṃ vaded āmiṣakiṃcithetor bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇīr avadantīti pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:424: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātikāyai bhikṣuṇyai cīvaraṃ dadyād anyatra parivartakāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:426: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ajñātikāyā bhikṣuṇyāś cīvaraṃ kuryāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:428: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṇīsārtheṇa sārdham adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyeta ato grāmāntaram api pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:429: tatrāyaṃ samayaḥ sārthagamanīyo mārgo bhavati sāśaṅkasaṃmataḥ sabhayasaṃmataḥ sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmato 'yaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
K01prmosubu:431: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṇīsārtheṇa sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya ekanāvam abhirohed ūrdhvagāminīṃ vā adhogāminīṃ vānyatra tīryakpārasantaraṇāt pātayantikā
K01prmosubu:433: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmena sārdham eka ekayā rahasi praticchanne āsane niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:435: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṇyā sārdham eka ekikayā rahasi praticchanne tiṣṭhet pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:437: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan bhikṣuṇīparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjītānyatra pūrvaṃ gṛhisamāraṃbhāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:440: tatrāyaṃ samayo glānasamayaḥ karmasamayaḥ adhvānamārgasamayaḥ cīvaradānakālasamayaḥ /
K01prmosubu:442: ekāvasathoṣitena bhikṣuṇā aglānenaikapiṇḍapātaḥ paribhoktavyas tataḥ uttari paribhuṃjīta pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:444: bhikṣavaḥ khalu saṃbahulāḥ kulāni saṃkrāmeyus tāṃś cec chrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayas
K01prmosubu:445: tv arthaṃ pravārayeyur maṇḍaiś cāpūpaiś cākāṃkṣibhis tair bhikṣubhir dvau trayo vā
K01prmosubu:446: pātrapūrāḥ pratigrahītavyāḥ tata uttari pratigṛhṇīyuḥ pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:447: dvau trīn vā pātrapūrān pratigṛhya tair bhikṣubhir bahirārāmaṃ gatvā santo bhikṣavaḥ saṃvibhaktavyā ātmanā ca paribhoktavyam ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ
K01prmosubu:449: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhuktavān pravāritaḥ akṛtātiriktaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded bhuñjīta vā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:451: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan bhikṣuṃ bhuktavantaṃ akṛtātirikte khādanīyabhojanīyenetyarthaṃ
K01prmosubu:452: pravārayed idam āyuṣman khāda idaṃ bhuṃkṣva ity āsvādanaprekṣī kaścid eṣa bhikṣur
K01prmosubu:453: āsvādito bhaviṣyati ity etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:456: tatrāyaṃ samayaḥ glānasamayaḥ karmasamayo 'dhvānamārgasamayo nāvādhirohaṇaṃ mahāsamājaḥ śramaṇabhaktasamayo 'yaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
K01prmosubu:458: yaḥ punar bhikṣur akāle khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded bhuñjīta vā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:460: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃnihitaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ khāded bhuñjīta vā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:462: yaḥ punar bhikṣur adattaṃ mukhadvārāhāram āhared anyatrodakadantakāṣṭhāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:464: yāni tāni bhagavatā bhikṣūṇāṃ praṇītabhojanāny akhyātāni tadyathā kṣīraṃ dadhi navanītaṃ
K01prmosubu:465: matsyo māṃsaṃ vallūrī yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ evaṃrūpāṇi praṇītabhojanāni ātmārtham aglānaḥ
K01prmosubu:466: parakulebhyo vijñāpya khāded bhuñjītā vā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:468: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan saprāṇakam udakaṃ paribhuñjīta pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:470: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sabhojane kule anupraskandyāsane niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:472: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan sabhojane kule praticchanne tiṣṭhet pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:474: yaḥ punar bhikṣur acelakāya vā acelikāyai vā parivrājakāya vā svahastaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ dadyāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:476: yaḥ punar bhikṣur udyuktāṃ senāṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmet pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:478: syād bhikṣos tadrūpaḥ pratyayaḥ udyuktāṃ senāṃ darśanāya upasaṃkramituṃ dvirātraparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā tasyāṃ senāyāṃ vipravastavyaṃ tata uttari vipravaset pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:480: dvirātraparamam api ced bhikṣus tasyāṃ senāyāṃ vipravasāṃ udyūṣikāṃ vā gacched dhvajāgraṃ vā balāgraṃ vā senāvyūham anīkadarśanaṃ vā pratyanubhavet pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:482: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto 'nāttamanā bhikṣoḥ prahāraṃ dadyāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:484: yaḥ punar bhikṣur abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto 'nāttamanā bhikṣoḥ prahāram upadarśayet* antatas talaśaktikam api pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:486: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan bhikṣoḥ duṣṭhulām āpattiṃ praticchādayet pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:488: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣum evaṃ vaded ehy āyuṣman kulāny upasaṃkramāvas tatra te dāpayiṣyāmi khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ yāvadāptaṃ /
K01prmosubu:489: sa tasya dāpayitvā praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ yāvadāptaṃ tataḥ paścād evaṃ vaded
K01prmosubu:490: gaccha tvam āyuṣman na mama tvayā sārdhaṃ sparśo 'pi tu ekākina eva me sparśo bhavati
K01prmosubu:491: kathāyāṃ vā niṣadyāyāṃ vā ity udyojanaprekṣī kaścid eṣa bhikṣur udyojito bhaviṣyatīty
K01prmosubu:494: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ātmārtham aglāno vitapanaprekṣī jyotiḥ samavadhavyāt samavadhāpayed vā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:496: yaḥ punar bhikṣur dhārmikasaṃghakaraṇīye bhikṣoś chandaṃ datvā paścād abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto nāttamanā kṣepadharmam āpadyeta /
K01prmosubu:497: āhara bhikṣoś chandaṃ na te dadāmīti pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:499: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anupasaṃpannena pudgalena sārdhaṃ dvirātrād ūrdhvaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:501: yaḥ punar bhikṣur evaṃ vadet tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā te pratisevyamānā nālam antarāyāyeti
K01prmosubu:502: so bhikṣur bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyo mā tvam āyuṣmann evaṃ vocas tathāhaṃ bhagavato
K01prmosubu:503: dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā te ca pratisevyamānā
K01prmosubu:505: mā bhagavantam abhyācakṣuḥ na sādhu bhavati bhagavato 'bhyākhyānaṃ na ca punar bhagavān
K01prmosubu:506: evam āha anekaparyāyeṇa āyuṣmann antarāyikā dharmāḥ santaḥ antarāyikā evoktā bhagavatā
K01prmosubu:507: te ca pratisevyamānā alam antarāyāyeti niḥsṛja tvam āyuṣmann evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ /
K01prmosubu:508: so bhikṣur bhikṣubhir ucyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjed
K01prmosubu:509: dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyas tasya pratiniḥsargāya dvir api
K01prmosubu:510: trir api samanuyujyamānaḥ samanuśiṣyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ
K01prmosubu:513: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānaṃs tathāvādinaṃ pudgalam akṛtānudharmāṇam apratiniḥsṛṣṭe tasmin
K01prmosubu:514: pāpake dṛṣṭigate ālāpayet saṃlapet tena sārdhaṃ saṃvaset saṃbhuṃjīta sahāgāraśayyām
K01prmosubu:517: śramaṇoddeśaś cāpy evaṃ vadet tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā te ca pratisevyamānā nālam antarāyāyeti /
K01prmosubu:518: sa śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyo mā tvam āyuṣman śramaṇoddeśa evaṃ vocaḥ
K01prmosubu:519: tathāhaṃ bhagavato dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā
K01prmosubu:521: mā bhagavantam abhyācakṣuḥ na sādhu bhavati bhagavato 'bhyākhyānaṃ na ca punar bhagavān
K01prmosubu:522: evāha anekaparyāyeṇa śramaṇoddeśa antarāyikā dhamāḥ santaḥ antarāyikā evoktā bhagavatā
K01prmosubu:525: sa śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣubhir ucyamānas tad vastu cet pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ
K01prmosubu:526: no cet pratiniḥsṛjed dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyas tasya vastunaḥ
K01prmosubu:527: pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api samanuyujyamānaḥ samanuśiṣyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed
K01prmosubu:528: ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjet sa śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyo
K01prmosubu:529: 'dyāgreṇāyuṣman śramaṇoddeśa nāsau bhagavāṃs tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śāstā /
K01prmosubu:530: evaṃrūpasyānyatamānyatmasya brahmacāriṇaḥ pṛṣṭataḥ mā samanubadhāna yāvad apy anye
K01prmosubu:531: śramaṇoddeśāḥ labhante bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ dvirātraparamaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ sāpi te
K01prmosubu:532: adyāgreṇa nāsti cara careṇa mohapuruṣa naśyati /
K01prmosubu:533: yaḥ punar bhikṣur jānan tathānāśitaṃ śramaṇoddeśam upasthāpayed vā upalālayed vā tena vā sārdhaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:535: navaṃ khalu bhikṣuṇā cīvaraṃ pratilabhya trayāṇāṃ durvarṇīkaraṇānām anyatamānyatamaḥ
K01prmosubu:536: nīlo vā lohito vā pīto vā durvarṇīkaraṇāya ādātavyo 'nādāya ced bhikṣus trayāṇāṃ
K01prmosubu:537: durvarṇīkaraṇānām anyatamānyatamaṃ durvaṇīkaraṇaṃ nīlaṃ vā lohitaṃ vā pītaṃ vā navaṃ
K01prmosubu:540: yaḥ punar bhikṣu ratnaṃ vā ratnasaṃmataṃ vā svahastena udgṛhṇīyād udgrāhayed vānyatrādhyārāmagatād vādhyāvāsagatād vā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:541: bhikṣuṇādhyārāmagataṃ vādhyāvāsagataṃ vā ratnaṃ ratnasaṃmataṃ vā udgrahītavyaṃ yasyedaṃ bhaviṣyati so hariṣyati ity evaṃ manasikṛtvā /
K01prmosubu:544: bhagavatā deśitam anvardhamāsaṃ snāyād anyatra samayāt tadatikramāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:545: ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ -- adhyardho māsaḥ śeṣo grīṣmāṇāṃ pūrvo māso varṣāṇāṃ ity ete
K01prmosubu:546: ardhatṛtīyamāsā uṣṇasamayo 'vaśiṣṭaṃ glānasamayaḥ karmasamayo vṛṣṭisamayo vātavṛṣṭisamayo
K01prmosubu:549: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃcintya tīryagyonigataṃ prāṇinaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayet pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:551: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃcintya kaccid asya bhikṣor muhūrtam api tāvad aphāṣaṃ sparśaṃ bhaved etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā bhikṣoḥ kaukṛtyam upasaṃharet pātayantikā /
K01prmosubu:557: yaḥ punar bhikṣur mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ sahāgāraśayyāṃ kalpayet pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:559: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣuṃ bhīṣayed bhīṣāpayed vāntato hāsyaprekṣyam api pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:561: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣor vā bhikṣuṇyā vā śikṣamāṇāyā vā śrāmaṇerasya vā śrāmaṇerikāyā
K01prmosubu:562: vā pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā upānahaṃ vā sūcīgharaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vānyatamānyatamaṃ
K01prmosubu:563: vā jīvitapariṣkāram upanidadhyād upanidhāpayet tadrūpapratyayād anyatra pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:565: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣoś cīvaram vikalya tataḥ paścād apratyuddhārya paribhuṃjīta pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:567: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ kupito 'nāttamanā pariśuddhaṃ anāpattikaṃ bhikṣuṃ amūlakena saṃghāvaśeṣeṇa dharmeṇānudhvaṃsayet pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:569: yaḥ punar bhikṣur apuruṣayā striyā sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāyādhvamārgaṃ pratipadyetāntato grāmāntaram api pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:571: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ steyasārthena sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāyādhvamārgaṃ pratipadyetāntato grāmāntaram api pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:573: yaḥ punar bhikṣur ūnaviṃśavarṣaṃ pudgalaṃ bhikṣubhāvāyopasaṃpādayeta pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:574: sa ca pudgalo 'nupasaṃpannas te ca bhikṣavo garhyā ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
K01prmosubu:576: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ svahastena pṛthivīṃ khanyāt khānayed vā pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:579: pratyekapravāraṇāyā punaḥ punaḥ pravāraṇāyāḥ kālikapravāraṇāyā nityapravāraṇāyā anyatra ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
K01prmosubu:581: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣubhir āyuṣmatā tvayā śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti ucyamāna evaṃ
K01prmosubu:582: vaden nāhaṃ tava bālasya mūḍhasya duṣprajñasya vacanāni śikṣiṣyāmi yāvan nāhaṃ bhikṣūn
K01prmosubu:583: prakṣyāmi sūtradharān vinayadharān mātṛkadharān iti pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:584: sarvajñatākāmena bhikṣuṇā śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ praṣṭavyāḥ sūtradharā vinayadharā mātṛkadharā ayaṃ tatra samayaḥ /
K01prmosubu:586: yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣūṇāṃ kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ bhedagṛhītānāṃ vivādam
K01prmosubu:587: āpannānāṃ tūṣṇīm upaśrutikas tiṣṭhed yad ete bhikṣavo vakṣyanti tad ahaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīty
K01prmosubu:590: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃghe dharmikāyāṃ viniścayakathāyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ āsanāt tūṣṇīm utthāya prakrāmet santaṃ bhikṣum anavapṛcchyānyatra tadrūpapratyayāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:596: yaḥ punar bhikṣur akāle grāmaṃ praviśet santaṃ bhikṣum anavapṛcchya anyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:598: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sabhaktaḥ kule nimantritaḥ pūrvabhaktaṃ paścādbhaktaṃ kuleṣu cāritram āpadyeta santaṃ kulaṃ apratisaṃvedito 'nyatra tadrūpāt pratyayāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:600: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anirgatāyāṃ rajanyām anudgate 'ruṇe anirhṛteṣu ratneṣu ratnasaṃmateṣu
K01prmosubu:601: vā rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya indrakīlaṃ vā indrakīlasāmantakaṃ vā samatikraned
K01prmosubu:604: yaḥ punar bhikṣur anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtre uddiśyamāne evaṃ vaded idānīm ahaṃ
K01prmosubu:605: jānāmi āyuṣmanto 'yam api kila dharmaḥ sūtragataḥ sūtraparyāyāpannoddeśyam āgacchatīti
K01prmosubu:606: tatrāyuṣmantaṃ ced bhikṣavo jānīyuḥ niṣaṇṇapūrvaṃ āyuṣmatā dvitrikṛtvaṃ poṣadhe kaḥ
K01prmosubu:607: punar vādo bhūya iti āyuṣmato ajñānataḥ na muktiḥ yata āpattim āpannaḥ tato yathādharmaṃ
K01prmosubu:608: kārayitavya uttaraṃ ca kaukṛtyam āropayitavyaṃ -- āyuṣman te alābho 'labdhaḥ durlabdho
K01prmosubu:609: na sulabdho yat tvaṃ anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddiśyamāne na satkṛtya śṛṇoṣi na
K01prmosubu:610: gurukaroṣi nārthikaroṣi na manasikaroṣi ekāgracittenāvahitaśrotreṇa na śṛṇoṣi sarvacittasaṃkalpair api na śṛṇoṣi /
K01prmosubu:613: yaḥ punar bhikṣur asthimayaṃ vā viṣāṇamayaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ kārayet tad bhedanāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:615: bhikṣuṇā saṃghasya pīṭhaṃ vā mañcaṃ kārayatā sugatāṣṭāṅgulipramāṇāḥ pādāḥ kārayitavyā anyatra adhastāt* aṭanyās tata uttaraṃ kārayec chedanāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:617: yaḥ punar bhikṣus tūlasaṃstṛtaṃ pīṭhaṃ vā mañcaṃ avanahed avanāhayed vā uddalanāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:619: niṣīdanaṃ bhikṣuṇā kārayatā prāmāṇikaṃ kārayitavyaṃ tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ -- dīrghato
K01prmosubu:620: vitastrī dve sugatavitastyās tīryak sārdhavitastir daśānāñ ca vitastis tata uttaraṃ
K01prmosubu:623: kaṇḍupraticchādanaṃ bhikṣuṇā kārayatā prāmāṇikaṃ kārayitavyaṃ tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ -- dīrghataś catasro vitastayaḥ sugatavitastyas tiryag dve tata uttaraṃ kārayec chedanāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:625: varṣāśāṭīcīvaraṃ bhikṣuṇā kārayatā prāmāṇikaṃ kārayitavyaṃ tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ -- dīrghataḥ ṣaṭ vitastayaḥ sugatavitastyas tiryak sārdhe dve tata uttaraṃ kārayec chedanāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:627: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārayed uttaraṃ vā sugatacīvarāt pāyantikā /
K01prmosubu:628: tatredaṃ sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ dīrghato nava vitastayaḥ tiryak ṣaḍ vitastayaḥ idaṃ sugatacīvarapramāṇam* /
K01prmosubu:629: Pay.Schl. uddiṣṭā mayāyuṣmanto navatiḥ pāyantikā dharmāḥ /
K01prmosubu:630: tatrāham āyuṣmantaḥ pṛcchāmi -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
K01prmosubu:631: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tuṣṇīm evāhaṃ dhārayāmi /
K01prmosubu:633: ime khalv āyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pratideśanīyā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
K01prmosubu:635: yaḥ punar bhikṣur antagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya carantyā ajñātyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ santikāt sahastaṃ
K01prmosubu:636: khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pratigṛhya khāded vā bhuñjīta vā tena bhikṣuṇā bahirārāmaṃ gatvā
K01prmosubu:637: bhikṣor antike pratideśayitavyam garhyam asmy āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno 'sātmyaṃ
K01prmosubu:638: pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmīti ayam api dharmaḥ pratideśanīyaḥ /
K01prmosubu:640: saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ kuleṣu nimantritā bhuṃjīran tatra ced bhikṣuṇī vyapadeśamānā
K01prmosubu:641: sthitā syād iha bhojanīyaṃ datta odanaṃ datta sūpaṃ datteti sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣubhir
K01prmosubu:642: evaṃ syād vacanīyā āgamayasva bhagini muhūrtaṃ yāvad bhikṣavo bhuṃjate /
K01prmosubu:643: ekenāpi bhikṣuṇā cet tāṃ bhikṣuṇīm apasārayituṃ na vacanīyaṃ sarvair bhikṣubhiḥ bahirārāmaṃ
K01prmosubu:644: gatvā bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśitavyaṃ garhyam āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpannā asātmyaṃ
K01prmosubu:645: pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāma iti ayam api dharmaḥ pratideśanīyaḥ /
K01prmosubu:647: yāni tāni kulāni śikṣāsaṃvṛtisaṃmatāni yaḥ punar bhikṣus tadrūpeṣu saṃghasya śaikṣeṣu
K01prmosubu:648: kuleṣu śikṣāsaṃvṛtisaṃmateṣu pūrvam apravāritasya khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pratigṛhya
K01prmosubu:649: khāded bhuñjīta vā tena bhikṣuṇā bahirārāmaṃ gatvā bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśanīyaṃ
K01prmosubu:650: tat sthānam āpanno 'sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmīti ayam api dharmaḥ pratideśanīyaḥ /
K01prmosubu:652: yāni tāni kāni śayanāsanāni sāśaṃkasaṃmatāni sabhayasaṃmatāni sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmatāni
K01prmosubu:653: yaḥ punar bhikṣus tadrūpeṣu saṃghasyāraṇyakeṣu śayaneṣu sāśaṃkasaṃmateṣu sabhayasaṃmateṣu
K01prmosubu:654: sapratibhayabhairavasaṃmateṣu pūrvam apratisaṃvidyate vane bahirārāmasya khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
K01prmosubu:655: khāded bhuṃjīta vā tena bhikṣuṇā bhikṣūṇām antike pratideśayitavyaṃ garhyam asmy
K01prmosubu:656: āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno 'sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmīti ayam
K01prmosubu:659: tatrāham āyuṣmantaḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
K01prmosubu:660: dvir api trir api -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
K01prmosubu:661: pariśuddhā āyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
K01prmosubu:663: ime khalv āyuṣmantaḥ saṃbahulāḥ śaikṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
K01prmosubu:665: parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:667: nātyutkṛṣṭaṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:669: nātyavakṛṣṭaṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:671: na hastiśuṇḍakaṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:673: na tālapatraṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:675: na kulmāṣapiṇḍakaṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:677: na nāgaśīrṣakaṃ nivāsanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:679: parimaṇḍalaṃ cīvaraṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:681: nātyutkṛṣṭaṃ cīvaraṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:683: nātyupakṛṣṭaṃ cīvaraṃ nivāsayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:685: susaṃvṛtā antargṛhe gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:687: supraticchannā antargṛhe gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:689: alpaśabdā antargṛhe gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:695: nodguṇṭhikā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:697: notkṛṣṭikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:699: notsaktikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:701: na vyastikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:703: na paryastikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:705: nolambikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:707: noṭṭambikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:709: notkuṭakayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:711: na nikaṭotkuṭakayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:713: na skambhākṛtā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:715: na kāyapracālakaṃ antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:717: na bāhupracālakaṃ antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:719: na śīrṣapracālakaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā / /
K01prmosubu:721: nāṃsotphatikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:723: na hastasaṃlagnikayā antargṛhaṃ gamiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:725: nānujñātā antargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:727: nāprativekṣyāsanaṃ antargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:729: na sarvakāyaṃ samavadhāyāntargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:731: na pāde pādam ādhāyāntargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:733: na gulphe gulpham ādhāyāntargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:735: na sakthani sakthi ādhāyāntargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:737: na saṃkṣipya pādau antargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:739: na vikṣipya pādau antargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:741: na vyataṅgikayā antargṛhe āsane niṣatsyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:743: satkṛtya piṇḍapātaṃ pratigrahīṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:745: samatīrthikaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pratigrahīṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:747: samasūpikaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pratigrahīṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:749: sāvadānaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pratigrahīṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:751: na anāgate khādanīyabhojanīye pātram upanāmayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:753: nodanena sūpikaṃ praticchādayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:755: sūpikena vā odanaṃ bhūyaskāmatām upādāya iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:757: nopari khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātraṃ dhārayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:759: satkṛtya piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:761: nātikhuṇḍakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:763: nātimahāntaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:765: parimaṇḍalaṃ ālopam ālopayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:767: na anāgate ālope mukhadvāraṃ vivariṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:769: na sālopena mukhena vācaṃ pravyāhariṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:771: na cuccatkārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:773: naśuśaśutkārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:775: na thutyutkārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:777: na phuphphuphkārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:779: na jihvāniścārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:781: na sikthapṛthakkārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:783: nāvaraṇakārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:785: na gallāpahārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:787: na jihvāsphoṭakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:789: na kavalacchedakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:791: na hastāvalehakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:793: na pātrāvalehakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:795: na hastasaṃdhūnakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:797: na pātrasaṃdhūnakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:799: na stūpākṛtim avagṛhya piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:801: nāvadhyānaprekṣiṇo 'ntarikasya bhikṣoḥ pātram avalokayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:803: na sāmiṣeṇa pāṇinā udakasthālakaṃ grahīṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:805: na sāmiṣeṇodakenāntarikaṃ bhikṣuṃ sekṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:807: na sāmiṣam udakam antargṛhe chorayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:809: na pātreṇa vighasaṃś chorayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:811: anāstīrṇe pṛthivīpradeśe pātraṃ sthāpayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:813: na taṭe na prapāte na prāgbhāre pātraṃ sthāpayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:815: notthitāḥ pātraṃ nirmādayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:817: na taṭe na prapāte na prāgbhāre pātraṃ nirmādayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:819: na nadyāḥ kāryakāriṇyā pratisrotaḥ pātrodakaṃ grahīṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:821: na utthitā niṣaṇṇāyāglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:823: na niṣaṇṇā nipaṇṇāyāglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:825: na nīcatarake āsane niṣaṇṇā uccatarake āsane niṣaṇṇāyāglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:827: na pṛṣṭhato gacchantaḥ purato gacchate aglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:829: nonmārgeṇa gacchanto mārgeṇa gacchate āglānāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /

K01prmosubu:873: nāglānā utthitā uccāraprasrāvaṃ kariṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /

K01prmosubu:877: nāglānā saharite pṛthivīpradeśe uccāraprasrāvaṃ kheṭaṃ siṃghāṇakaṃ vāntaṃ viriktaṃ chorayiṣyāma iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:879: nāsādhikapauruṣaṃ vṛkṣam adhirokṣyāmo 'nyatrāpada iti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
K01prmosubu:880: uddiṣṭā me āyuṣmantaḥ saṃbahulāḥ śaikṣā dharmāḥ /
K01prmosubu:881: tatrāham āyuṣmataḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddāḥ
K01prmosubu:882: dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
K01prmosubu:883: pariśuddhā āyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi //
K01prmosubu:885: ime khalv āyuṣmantaḥ saptādhikaraṇaśamathāḥ dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
K01prmosubu:893: utpannotpannāny adhikaraṇāny ebhiḥ saptabhir adhikaraṇaśamathair dharmair dāpayiṣyāmaḥ śamayiṣyāmo vyupaśamayiṣyāmo dharmavinaye śāstuḥ śāsane
K01prmosubu:895: tatrāham āyuṣmataḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
K01prmosubu:896: dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ /
K01prmosubu:897: pariśuddhā āyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam evāhaṃ dhārayāmi /
K01prmosubu:898: For the prose and verses see Klaus T. Schmidt:
K01prmosubu:899: Der Schlußteil des Prātimokṣasūtra der Sarvāstivādins,
K01prmosubu:900: Text in Sanskrit und Tocharisch A verglichen mit den Parallelversionen anderer Schulen,
K01prmosubu:904: uddiṣṭāś catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmās trayodaśa saṃghāvaśeṣā dharmā dvāv aniyatau dharmau /
K01prmosubu:905: triṃśan naiḥsargikapāyantikā dharmāḥ navati pāyantikā dharmāś catvāraḥ pratideśanīyā
K01prmosubu:906: dharmāḥ saṃbahulā śaikṣā dharmāḥ saptādhikaraṇaśamathā dharmā etāvat tasya bhagavatas
K01prmosubu:907: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sūtragataṃ sūtraparyāpannam iti yo vā punar
K01prmosubu:908: anyo 'py āgacched dharmasyānudharmaḥ tatra sahitaiḥ samagraiḥ saṃmodamānair avivadamānais
K01prmosubu:910: kṣāntiḥ paramaṃ tapas titikṣā nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhāḥ /
K01prmosubu:911: na hi pravrajitaḥ paropatāpī śramaṇo bhavati parān viheṭhayānaḥ // 1
K01prmosubu:916: mātrajñatā ca bhakte 'smin prāntaṃ ca śayanāsanam*
K01prmosubu:918: yathāpi bhramaraḥ puṣpād varṇagandhāv aheṭhayan* [yathā hi] /
K01prmosubu:919: ḍayate rasam ādāya evaṃ grāme muniś caret* // 4
K01prmosubu:920: na pareṣāṃ vilomāni na pareṣāṃ kṛtākṛtam* /
K01prmosubu:921: ātmanas tu samīkṣeta samāni viṣamāṇi ca // 5
K01prmosubu:922: adhicetasi mā pramādyato munino maunapadeṣu śikṣataḥ {B:
K01prmosubu:925: śokā na bhavanti tāyina upaśāntasya sadā smṛtimataḥ // 6
K01prmosubu:926: dadataḥ puṇyaṃ pravardhate vairaṃ saṃyamato na cīyate /
K01prmosubu:927: kuśalī prajahāti pāpakaṃ kleśānāṃ kṣayatas tu nirvṛtiḥ {B: kṣayitas} // 7
K01prmosubu:930: kāyena saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu vācātha saṃvaraḥ {B: vācā ca} /
K01prmosubu:931: manasā saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu sarvatra saṃvaraḥ /
K01prmosubu:933: vācānurakṣī manasā susaṃvṛtaḥ kāyena caivākuśalaṃ na kuryāt* /
K01prmosubu:934: etāṃs trīn karmapathān viśodhya nārāgayen mārgam ṛṣipraveditam* // 10
K01prmosubu:935: buddho vipaśyī ca śikhī ca viśvabhu krakutsundaḥ kanakamuniś ca kāśyapaḥ {B:
K01prmosubu:937: anuttaraḥ śākyamuniś ca gautamo devātidevo naradamyasārathiḥ // 11
K01prmosubu:940: asmin sagauravā buddhā buddhānāṃ śrāvakāś ca ye /
K01prmosubu:944: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ // 14
K01prmosubu:945: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
K01prmosubu:949: yasyārthe sūtram uddiṣṭaṃ yasyārthe poṣadhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
K01prmosubu:950: tac chīlam anurakṣadhvaṃ bālāgraṃ camaro yathā // 17
